name: ✨So May It Be: A Witch Dating Simulator✨ DEMO
name_original: ✨So May It Be: A Witch Dating Simulator✨ DEMO
description:
DEMO

✨So May It Be: A Witch Dating Simulator✨ is a game where you play as a witch hanging out with your witchy friends ditching school, contacting the dead and falling in love 💖.

By Planchette Games

Minigame design, programming, implementation and sound by Saoirse Lynch

Art, narrative design and writing by Ellen Cunningham
